devdoc.author: BootNode
devdoc.details: Factory contract for deploying and configuring a new Delegation Wallet Deploys a GnosisSafe, a DelegationOwner and a DelegationGuard, sets Safe wallet threshold to 1, the DelegationOwner contract as owner together with the deployer and the DelegationGuard as the Safe's guard.
devdoc.title: DelegationWalletFactory

deploy(address,address).notice: Deploys a new DelegationWallet with the msg.sender as the owner.

deployFor(address,address,address).notice: Deploys a new DelegationWallet for a given owner.
